sentences.sentence: Hundreds are initiated into the sect each year.
sentences.translation: 每年有好几百人被接纳到这个教派中。

sentences.sentence: Every conceivable Protestant sect was publishing treatises of theological speculation and religious propaganda at a surprising rate.
sentences.translation: 任何能想到的新教派别都在以惊人的速度出版神学思辨的论文和宗教宣传的论文。

sentences.sentence: Members of the small Yazidi sect which live in the area were the apparent targets.
sentences.translation: 显然袭击的目标是居住在这个地区的少数雅兹迪教派的成员。
